data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Furniture serves various functions but takes up lots of room, so we need to choose them carefully. Look for pieces that will be truly useful. This will give us as much space as possible for flexible instruction, and allow students to move around easily. Tables come in many shapes and sizes. They can accommodate small groups. While tables can work well, desks give more flexibility for forming pairs of students or accommodating individuals. And we'll need a number of chairs to go with the tables and desks. Simple wire shelving from a hardware store provides space for storing books and supplies and displaying projects. Wooden and plastic shelving work fine. And we'll also need baskets or boxes on shelves to store personal items, books, and classroom supplies. (127字)
data.referenceText: What furniture and other things are necessary in a classroom?
data.referenceTranslate: 教室里需要什么家具和其他东西?
